sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Home Depot ( HD ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 4.0%.
Year to date, Home Depot registers a 5.6% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is AT&T ( T ), trading down 0.6%.
AT&T is lower by about 2.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Johnson & Johnson ( JNJ ), trading down 0.6%, and American Express ( AXP ), trading up 0.9% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
